7#include "compiler/translator/TranslatorMetalDirect/IntroduceVertexIndexID.h"
8#include "compiler/translator/TranslatorMetalDirect/AstHelpers.h"
9#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermRebuild.h"
10#include "compiler/translator/StaticType.h"
11#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/BuiltIn.h"
12using namespace sh;
13
14////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
15
16namespace
17{
18
19constexpr const TVariable kgl_VertexIDMetal(
20 BuiltInId::gl_VertexID,
21 ImmutableString("gl_VertexID"),
22 SymbolType::BuiltIn,
23 TExtension::UNDEFINED,
24 StaticType::Get<EbtUInt, EbpHigh, EvqVertexID, 1, 1>());
25
26constexpr const TVariable kgl_instanceIdMetal(
27 BuiltInId::gl_VertexID,
28 ImmutableString("instanceIdMod"),
29 SymbolType::AngleInternal,
30 TExtension::UNDEFINED,
31 StaticType::Get<EbtUInt, EbpHigh, EvqInstanceID, 1, 1>());
32
33
34class Rewriter : public TIntermRebuild
35{
36 public:
37 Rewriter(TCompiler &compiler) : TIntermRebuild(compiler, true, true)
38 {}
39
40
41 private:
42
43 PreResult visitFunctionDefinitionPre(TIntermFunctionDefinition &node) override
44 {
45 if(node.getFunction()->isMain())
46 {
47 const TFunction * mainFunction = node.getFunction();
48 bool needsVertexId = true;
49 bool needsInstanceId = true;
50 std::vector<const TVariable *> mVariablesToIntroduce;
51 for(size_t i = 0; i < mainFunction->getParamCount(); ++i)
52 {
53 const TVariable * param = mainFunction->getParam(i);
54 Name instanceIDName = Pipeline{Pipeline::Type::InstanceId, nullptr}.getStructInstanceName(
55 Pipeline::Variant::Modified);
56 if(Name(*param) == instanceIDName)
57 {
58 needsInstanceId = false;
59 }
60 else if (param->getType().getQualifier() == TQualifier::EvqVertexID)
61 {
62 needsVertexId = false;
63 }
64 }
65 if(needsInstanceId)
66 {
67 mVariablesToIntroduce.push_back(&kgl_instanceIdMetal);
68 }
69 if(needsVertexId)
70 {
71 mVariablesToIntroduce.push_back(&kgl_VertexIDMetal);
72 }
73 const TFunction & newFunction = CloneFunctionAndAppendParams(mSymbolTable, nullptr, *node.getFunction(), mVariablesToIntroduce);
74 TIntermFunctionPrototype * newProto = new TIntermFunctionPrototype(&newFunction);
75 return new TIntermFunctionDefinition(newProto, node.getBody());
76 }
77 return node;
78 }
79};
80
81} // anonymous namespace
82
83////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
84
85bool sh::IntroduceVertexAndInstanceIndex(TCompiler &compiler, TIntermBlock &root)
86{
87 if (!Rewriter(compiler).rebuildRoot(root))
88 {
89 return false;
90 }
91 return true;
92}
93
